## dialog.setConfirm() function

Sets the function to be run when Blockly.dialog.confirm() is called.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setConfirm(confirmFunction: (p1: string, p2: (p1: boolean) => AnyDuringMigration) => AnyDuringMigration): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  confirmFunction | (p1: string, p2: (p1: boolean) =&gt; AnyDuringMigration) =&gt; AnyDuringMigration | The function to be run. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
